name: TalkBlazing
_source: speak;Blazing;Oh, hello Prince Sages.|I appreciate your country's hospitality.
speak;Blazing;I'm just concerned at having to take lives...|Violence begets more violence.
speak;Sages;I suppose it is a lot to ask of you to stay.
speak;Blazing;I'll get over it, I think.|I have to figure out what happened.
speak;Sages;Yeah, this whole biz is confusing.
speak;Blazing;If you ever need any spiritual guidance...|I'll try what I can.
speak;Sages;Not much of a religious guy myself...|But, I appreciate it Blaze!
